name: Ice Path
desc:
You layer ice over a 60 foot long, 5 foot wide, 6 inch thick line. The ice must have at least one end on solid ground, and cannot be at an angle steeper than 15 degrees.

The ice forms a traversable path, even over water. Creatures ignore difficult terrain when traveling on the path.
empower: Double either the width or the length of the path.
author: CrusaderDroid
